inclusion.criterion: 1 or more syncopal spells in the year preceding enrolment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: More than -2 points on the Calgary Syncope Symptom Score
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other causes of syncope, such as ventricular tachycardia
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
